page.title: 02Newcastle Outdoor Market
page.content: In the market on a hot day there are lots of people about. The stalls sell things to eat or wear and stallholders shout the prices of the goods they are selling.In the market as well as the sights you can smell things like the food and leather goods.The market is a very busy and noisy place and there are lots of cars about.There is a lot of rubbish on the floor even though there are litter bins about. The guildhall is in the market and people can see what time it is by the guildhall clock.People are pushing and shoving and they are heavily laden with goods.There is a man selling newspapers and pigeons are pecking at food on the floor.On the bottom half of the market there are seats and trees shading them.
